text:
="preserve">Dave is a British free to air television channel owned by the UKTV, which is available in the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland. The channel took the name Dave, in October 2007, between but it had been on air, under various identies and formats since October 1998.
UK Gold Classics and UK Gold 2 take Fridays and Sundays from 6:00pm to 2:00am
